copy.titleString: Welcome to your new Google Pixel Watch
copy.bodyString: Stay connected to your body and your world
Slide the band through the outer loop, press the metal peg into a hole, then tuck in the band.
You can swap band sizes and styles in a few simple steps
Press the band secure button, then slide the band over the band secure button. Repeat on other side.
Use the band to press the band secure button, then slide the band into place. Repeat on other side.
After setting up your watch, open the Fitbit mobile app and connect your account to start personalizing fitness goals and tracking your progress on your new watch
Set up Google Assistant, and use your voice to send texts, manage your day, and get quick answers

copy.titleString: Take a tour of top features
copy.bodyString: Swipe up on the watch below to learn how to quickly access features that matter most
Press the crown from the watch face to find all of your apps
Press the side button from any screen to quickly find your recently used apps
Sensors track your workouts, heart rate, and sleep trends
Make phone calls and get answers from Google Assistant with the spaker and mic
Press & hold the crown to power your watch. Press the crown to wake your watch.
Rapidly press the crown at least 5 times to call emergency services or chosen contacts
